expo.name: Get Rich
expo.description: This is a personal budget management app.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Get Rich needs access to your camera to set your profile picture or capture photos of receipts.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Get Rich uses Face ID to securely unlock the app and protect your data.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Get Rich needs access to your microphone for audio recording when required in supported features.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Get Rich needs permission to save receipts for your records.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Get Rich needs access to your photos to let you select images for your profile or review saved receipts.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This helps us understand how you use our app and improve your experience.

plugins.cameraPermission: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your camera to set your profile picture or capture photos of receipts.
plugins.microphonePermission: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your microphone for audio recording when required in supported features.

plugins.photosPermission: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your photos to let you select images for your profile or review saved receipts.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs permission to save receipts for your records

plugins.faceIDPermission: $(PRODUCT_NAME) uses Face ID to securely unlock the app and protect your data.

plugins.userTrackingPermission: This helps us understand how you use our app and improve your experience.
